contents: Article 3 (Function) The Sports Fair Committee (hereinafter referred to as the *Committee) deliberates and decides on the following matters in order to achieve the purpose of Article 43, Paragraph 1 of the Articles of Incorporation. Revised 2022. 1. 24. 1. Matters pertaining to the establishment and revision of the regulations of the Sports Council 2. Matters pertaining to the authoritative interpretation of the regulations of the Sports Council Revised 2021. 7. 9. 3. Matters relating to awards from the sports community 4. Korean Sports Council Matters pertaining to recommendation of award recipients for the Athletics Award (hereinafter referred to as *Athletics Award) 5. Matters pertaining to recommendation of award recipients to the government and other related organizations 6. Instructors/competitors registered in accordance with the registration regulations for executives of the Sports Association and executives of sports association-related organizations and players. Matters pertaining to disciplinary action against players, referees, player management personnel, and athletics departments. Revised July 9, 7, 2021. Matters pertaining to recommendations for acquisition of nationality by outstanding foreign talent in the field of sports. 8. Matters pertaining to the National Sports Association of Korea, members of member sports organizations, and executives of member city/provincial sports associations. Deliberation on recognition of exceptions to the limit on the number of reappointments (hereinafter referred to as *executive deliberation) and re-deliberation of executive deliberation for executives of city/provincial sports organizations of member city/provincial sports associations 9. Between the Sports Council and Sports Council-related organizations (including their members) 10. Mediation/arbitration of disputes that arise (games, systems, group management, etc.) 10. Other matters deemed necessary by the chairperson and submitted to the committee Revised on July 9, 2021
